divs: Sighting DetailsA white airplane appears fro a cloud after I took a picture of the cloud. The cloud had a shadow of a triangle behind it. The plane flew swiftly fleeing, then it disappeared in front of my eyes. I was looking directly at it when it went invisible.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Florissant
There were 2 other sightings in Florissant on or around September 28th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
